conversations.content: Please get me the link to reset my TechServices password. It should be in an email I received recently.

<function_thought>
I need to start by retrieving unread emails to identify the email that contains the link to reset the TechServices password for Emma Johnson. This is the first function in the trajectory plan.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_unread_emails()]</function_call>

    Best,

    Tech Services Support'
